availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Sterling C. Lilly (Caldwell County, Kentucky, farmer )

body.p: Caldwell County, Kentucky, farmer. Virginia native. Son of Wyatt F. Lilly and Martesia Lilly. Married to Mary Catherine Kingrey Lilly in Christian County, Kentucky, on December 23, 1863. Father of Wilson P. Lilly. Farmer in Caldwell County, Kentucky, in 1850. Farm laborer in Caldwell County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Caldwell County, District 2, p. 359B.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Caldwell County, Pollards Tan Yard, p. 151.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Caldwell County, Tennessee, p. 527A.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Christian County Marriages, Film #000465564, p. 97.
